tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  participant_age INT,
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  study_phase VARCHAR(20),
  study_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
   participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name TEXT NOT NULL,
   age INT,
   gender TEXT,
   study_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
   study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   study_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   study_owner TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_information TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id UUID,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants (participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE study_participants (
    study_id UUID,
    participant_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY (study_id, participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies (study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants (participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100),
    study_description TEXT,
    study_start_date DATE,
    study_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);
